intro: Gynochthodes celebica, commonly known as the Celebes starfish plant, is a rare and unique species native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and squashes, despite its unusual appearance. The plant is characterized by its star-shaped leaves and clusters of small, yellowish flowers. It is known for its slow growth and requires specific environmental conditions to thrive. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a conservation concern.
